item.title: An easy problem to solve for you.. Hopefully
item.dc:creator: @Bakpao Bakpao
item.description:
@Bakpao wrote:

Well, my first problem where I got stuck is a book.

I want a book to make text appear, like ::help for example, it pops up a dialogue with all the messages that are supposed to help you and inform you about the server.
Instead of ::help I would like the game book to do this.

So far I have this:

[code]public void starterbook()
{
if(playerHasItem(7681))
{
sendQuest("@dre@RippedScape commands", 8144); //Title
sendQuest(“line1”, 8145);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“line2”, 8148);
sendQuest(“line3”, 8149);
sendQuest(“line4”, 8150);
sendQuest(“line5”, 8151);
sendQuest(“line6”, 8152);
sendQuest(“line7”, 8153);
sendQuest(“line8”, 8154);
sendQuest(“line9”, 8155);
sendQuest(“line10”, 8156);
sendQuest(“nextline”, 8157);
sendQuest(“nextline”, 8158);
sendQuest(“nextline”, 8161);
sendQuest(“nextline”, 8162);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();

	}[/code]

I want to simply let the sendQuest’s appear when this book is beeing clicked. The option that will trigger it is going to be “READ”

Thanks in Advance,
Please note that I am no coder. I just do some modifying now and then.

Read full topic
item.source: An easy problem to solve for you.. Hopefully
